A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I think The Last Jedi is good Star Wars movie. Better than Force Awakens.Loot space battles in the movie I think this is great.
Spoilers:

I understand the peoples who disappointed about Snoke.
Snoke dead shocked me to but Kylo Ren is the emperor now.
Darth Vader plan same as Kylo Ren but Vader killed the emperor to late and he is dead beacuse of it. Snoke line in the movie very short we know about him very a little\,but I prefer Kylo Ren as the emperor.And who knows maybe the next movie appers new sith lord maybe Snoke master or Darth Sidious.
Luke dead scene is very sad to me but beautiful\,very emotional scene.I almost cried.When he look the sky and two sun just like the new hope.Movie has beautiful imagery.Mark Hammil acting fantastic in the movie.Luke very badass. :).And the final fight is epic.Good lightaber battles.Yoda appears very nostalgic\, good scene.Kylo Ren finally acting like a sith lord\,I know he is'nt. Epic movie.Rey is very good in this movie\, she is a good jedi.
I think the true star wars fans like the movie.
Cant wait the Episode 9.
